title: Consolidated Fund

content.text: All revenues and other moneys raised or received by Malta (not being revenues or other moneys payable into some other fund, being a fund established by or under any law for the time being in force in Malta for a specific purpose) shall, unless Parliament otherwise provides, be paid into and form one Consolidated Fund.

notes: This article establishes the Consolidated Fund of Malta, which is the principal fund into which all government revenues and other moneys are paid, except those specifically allocated to other funds by law.
